annotation: <data-piece><history><entry><input>sudo apt install python3-venv</input><output>Setting up python3-venv...</output><annotation>Goal: Install Python's virtual environment tools.</annotation></entry><entry><input>python3 -m venv myenv</input><output></output><annotation>Goal: Create a new Python virtual environment named `myenv`.</annotation></entry><entry><input>source myenv/bin/activate</input><output>(myenv) user@host:~$</output><annotation>Goal: Activate the Python virtual environment to isolate project dependencies.</annotation></entry><entry><input>pip install flask</input><output>Installing Flask...</output><annotation>Goal: Install the Flask web framework inside the virtual environment.</annotation></entry></history><current-entry><entry><input>exit</input><output>exit</output></entry><annotation>Goal: Exit the session after setting up the virtual environment and installing Flask.</annotation></current-entry></data-piece>
